mapper.insert: insert into board_table (boardTitle, boardWriter, boardContents, boardCreatedDate, boardFileName) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContents}, now(), boardFileName)
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits=boardHits+1 where bid=#{bid}
update board_table set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by bid desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select * from board_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by bid desc;
